attributes.title: Terrible. Did not perform as promised
attributes.review: I downloaded the trump 2020 app expecting it to direct me to the nearest public toilets, and frankly, it did not deliver. Instead it kept directing me to the White House for some reason. And for some reason it kept sending me weird, racially charged messages. Would not recommend.
